title: Calculate Freight Class
description: A shipper needs to determine the correct National Motor Freight Classification (NMFC) freight class for a new item to get accurate LTL shipping rates.

tasks.description: Enter the dimensions (length, width, height) and weight of the item being shipped.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately inputs the item's physical characteristics.

tasks.description: The system calculates the item's density (pounds per cubic foot).
Based on the density and the item's commodity type, the system looks up the correct freight class from an NMFC table.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system returns the correct freight class (e.g., Class 70).
